title: Men's Long Sleeve Dress Shirts, Regular Fit Stretch Wrinkle-Free Business Casual Button-Down Shirts with Front Pocket
description: Stylish & Comfortable: Our men's button up dress shirt offers a classic fit with a regular collar and functional two-button cuffs. Suited for weddings, business, and formal events, it ensures a refined look and comfort

Wrinkle-Free & Non-Iron: Expertly crafted from a blend of stretch and elastic materials, this button-down shirt maintains a crisp and polished appearance throughout the day without the hassle of ironing, worry-free and effort-saving

Practical Pockets: Featuring front pockets that offer both style and functionality, our long sleeve shirt is perfect for work, formal occasions, or going out. The quick-dry technology keeps you fresh in any setting

Adjustable Cuffs & Fit: This casual tuxedo shirt features adjustable cuffs for a personalized fit. Offered in classic, slim, and athletic silhouettes, it ensures a tailored experience that suits a range of body shapes

Occasion-Ready Style: Our men's dress shirt is perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, and father's day. Its adaptable design complements uniforms, from waitstaff to schools uniforms, and suits funerals and professional events

Easy Care & Durability: Machine washable and hand washable, our shirts are easy to maintain. The durable fabric retains its shape and color even after multiple washes, ensuring long-lasting wear. Suitable as a gift for fathers, husbands, and boyfriends
